hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Zora Shop#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Deku Tree#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Zora Scale#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Magic Meter#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Fire Bottle#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks. Except, apparently, the big rock blocking Dodongo's Cavern.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.
